title: Warehouses
description: Ozonation of warehouse facilities protects goods from mold and fungus, controls pests, extends product shelf life and creates a healthy air environment for staff.

mold-prevention.title: Mold and fungus control
mold-prevention.shortDesc: Suppressing mold growth and eliminating contamination hotspots in the warehouse
mold-prevention.content:
Uncontrolled mold growth in warehouse facilities leads to product spoilage and poor employee health. Mold spores and toxins in the air undermine staff immunity, while spoilage of goods and cardboard increases waste.

Warehouse ozonation addresses the problem comprehensively: it destroys existing contamination hotspots, suppresses new mold and fungus colonies, eliminates unpleasant odors from microbial activity.

Ozone interacts with the membrane structure of bacterial and fungal cells, disrupting their barrier function and causing cell death. Unlike chemical agents, the gas penetrates all crevices and remote corners, treating hard-to-reach areas.

For effective mold control, ozonation is recommended for 1–3 hours during off-hours. Ozone generator capacity is selected at approximately 1 g/h per 25 m³ of room volume.

general-storage.title: General goods storage
general-storage.shortDesc: Maintaining stored product quality and warehouse sanitary conditions
general-storage.content:
Warehouse logistics requires stable storage conditions to preserve a wide range of goods. Air ozonation comprehensively addresses disinfection, deodorization and spoilage prevention.

Regular ozonation reduces bacterial load in the air and on surfaces, extends product shelf life, eliminates unpleasant odors and creates comfortable conditions for staff.

The technology is especially relevant for mixed-purpose warehouses, distribution centers and logistics hubs storing diverse product groups with different storage requirements.

Ozone is universal: equally effective against bacteria, viruses, fungi and pests. Treatment does not require unloading and can be run automatically on a timer.
